overview: Lbyvs named Thaddeus (in English : Lebbaeus Whose Was Surname Thaddaeus ) documentary black and white, 35 mm and 33 minutes to the Armenian product in 1347, directed by Arby ovanessian is. This documentary was filmed by Solomon Minasian .  The subject of this documentary is the ceremony of the pilgrimage of the Church in the city ​​of Maku ; it shows some parts of the Armenian customs and traditions from the baptism to the ritual ceremony , along with the happy ceremonies of the Armenians and their way of life.
title: Lebbaeus Whose Surname Was Thaddaeus
